nodes.text: Sweet rolls were a type of warm baked foodstuff. They were made in a ring shape and were partially covered in a blue coating. Edible by humans, sweet rolls were available from Eim'ir's Bakery on the planet Corellia. The rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra had a local urchin acquire sweet rolls for her, using them to bribe the smuggler Sana Starros into showing her to the crime boss Lady Proxima. While interrogating the architect Golas Aram, the former loyalty officer Sinjir Rath Velus threatened to pull him apart like a sweet roll, though the threat failed to move Aram.
